scripts.test: cd client && cross-env CI=true npx react-scripts test --env=jsdom && cd ../server && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx jest
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run develop" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm build
